Introduction

Jung Yonghwa is a South Korean musician, singer-songwriter, record producer, and actor. Besides starring in multiple internationally popular dramas, Yonghwa is also known as the leader and main vocalist of the band CNBLUE. He made his official solo debut as a singer in 2015 with the mini-album "One Fine Day".

Yonghwa enlisted in the military in March 2018 and was dichardged in November 2019.
